title: Media Specialist
job_overview:
Position Summary
We’re expanding our media team and looking for experienced, results-driven individuals ready to thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. This is a unique opportunity to work closely with our in-house U.S. marketing team and support digital campaigns for some of the biggest car manufacturers in the world.
As a Media Specialist, you will play a key role in executing, monitoring, and optimizing paid media campaigns across Google, Meta (Facebook/Instagram), TikTok, and more. This position offers hands-on exposure to high-budget accounts, advanced campaign strategies, and collaboration with a top-tier team.
We are seeking candidates with at least 3 years of paid media experience who are detail-oriented, accountable, and eager to contribute to a collaborative team.
Key Responsibilities
? Manage and optimize paid media campaigns across platforms (Google, Meta, TikTok, etc.)
? Pull, analyze, and update daily campaign performance reports
? Monitor budgets, pacing, and bidding strategies to ensure efficiency and strong ROI
? Support A/B testing and creative optimization to improve campaign results
? Collaborate with U.S.-based marketing and creative teams
? Follow established workflows and ensure quality assurance in campaign execution
Requirements
? Minimum 3 years of hands-on experience managing paid media campaigns across Meta Ads Manager, Google Ads, TikTok Ads, etc.
? Strong attention to detail and ability to follow directions precisely
? Analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and optimize accordingly
? Proficiency in Google Sheets/Excel for tracking and reporting
? Familiarity with ad tracking (UTM parameters, Meta Pixel, GA4, etc.)
? Reliable internet connection and a quiet, professional workspace
? Must be available to work 8 AM – 5 PM PST, Monday to Friday
What We Offer
? Opportunity for overtime work and performance-based bonuses
? Training on internal tools, reporting processes, and workflow systems
? Work with a highly experienced U.S. marketing team and major global brands
? Clear path for career growth and skill development within a fast-growing company
Ready to join a high-performing digital media team?
Apply today and bring your skills to an exciting, fast-moving industry.
